gameDetails.name: Cry Havoc: New Orders
gameDetails.description:
This mini expansion for Cry Havoc brings new ways to score points and therefore increases number of available strategies players may follow in their games.

To use this expansion, take 2 Objective cards for each Terrain type and shuffle them to appropriate Terrain Tactics deck. There cards become part of each deck.

When player draws Objective card, he shows it to every player and put it face up next to the board. Then he draws another card.

All face up Objective cards are considered in play. At the end of the game, during the Final scoring each of these cards must be resolved and player who meet requirement is awarded with Victory Points. If two or more players meet requirement, they all are awarded victory points.

--

This extension was given with pre-orders of Cry Havoc at Spiel'16.

Includes 8 objective cards, 2 for each Terrain type.
